entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
